thread.title: Video: Demi Lovato Performs on 'Saturday Night Live'
thread.title_full: Video: Demi Lovato Performs on 'Saturday Night Live'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Video: Demi Lovato Performs on 'Saturday Night Live'
text:
Comments The 'Camp Rock' actress performs songs from her latest studio album 'Confident' on the NBC sketch show. 
Demi Lovato was a musical guest during Tracy Morgan 's return to " Saturday Night Live ". She delivered songs from her new album " Confident ", singing a medley of the title track and "Cool for the Summer" before later performing "Stone Cold". The Roots ' drummer Questlove applauded her performances on Twitter, "all due respect @ddlovato. #SNL." She replied, "Thank you so much @questlove." Her boyfriend Wilmer Valderrama gushed, "Just watched my @ddlovato completely KILL on @nbcsnl from my plane seat!" She responded, "Love you so much @WValderrama... You were the only things missing tonight... More to come." Earlier before "SNL", Demi got a sweet message from fellow singers. "Had to hit up @ddlovato last night and text her a bunch of 'yaaaas'es & 'we k's because of these vocals on #confident! you diiiid that!" Ariana Grande wrote, to which Demi replied, "It always means a lot coming from you girly!!! @ArianaGrande [Love] you tons and I can't wait for #FOCUS!!!" as she referred to Ariana's upcoming single. Ariana also praised another fellow female singer Selena Gomez who's rolling out a new album as well. "And while we're on the topic of new music I have to mention #REVIVAL is so effing good @selenagomez!! I'm in love," she wrote before adding, "I love nothing more than seeing young women doing what they love & kicking ass at it." Selena responded with "AMEN." Kelly Clarkson also offered her love for the two female singers, "My girl @ddlovato has her new album Confident out! Current favorite is #confident :)" she tweeted. "Okay there is so much new music out right now! @selenagomez great job on your new album! I love #sober."
